i am a weirdo.

pizza is my most favorite thing.

i am a huge fan of jason mraz.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1, I used to be a country singer before I went into business. How about you?
participant_2, nice to meet you! I'm participant_2, I'm a huge fan of Jason Mraz. What kind of business are you in?
I'm in the real estate business, and I love it! I get to meet new people and help them find their dream homes. What do you do for work?
I'm a gummy worm maker! It's a dream come true, but I need to move more and get my beer gut under control.
Haha, I feel you! I love pizza, and I'm trying to watch my weight. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts, I saw Jason Mraz last year! I also love to play video games. What about you?
I love to watch sports, and I'm a huge fan of the [team name]. I also love to go to the beach.
That's cool! I used to go to the beach a lot when I was younger, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
Me neither, I'm too busy with work! But I love to relax and watch sports when I can.
Me too! I'm so glad we met, participant_2. We should hang out sometime!
I'd love to! Let's exchange numbers.
Sounds good! Talk to you later
